tag_list: gazetka, promocja, gazetka-promocyjna, ald, oferty, wyprzedae
overview: Gazetkapromocyjna.com.pl - current promotional newsletters, repricing and sales in the most popular retail chains in Polish in one place. Updated daily to provide accurate information about promotions and offers from stores such as Lidl, Aldi, Tesco, Real and Saturn. Everything is presented in a book, which you can watch online or download to your computer and viewed with Adobe Reader, for example. You can also find us on social networks. Welcome.
